title: Schedule Lab Equipment Maintenance
description: A lab manager needs to schedule preventative maintenance for a high-performance liquid chromatography (HPLC) machine.

tasks.description: Check the maintenance schedule for the specific HPLC machine.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that the annual preventative maintenance is due next month.

tasks.description: Contact the equipment vendor to schedule a service visit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent contacts the vendor and schedules a service engineer for a specific date.

tasks.description: Block off the equipment's time in the lab scheduling system for the day of the maintenance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully makes the HPLC unavailable for booking on the scheduled date.

tasks.description: Log the completion of the maintenance and upload the service report once the visit is complete.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the maintenance record and attaches the vendor's service report.
